Song.title: Cling To Christ
Song.copyright: © 2015 Sovereign Grace Praise Music & Words by Jason Hansen, Bob Kauflin, and David LaChance, Jr.

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [C/E | F | C/G | G]
VERSE 1: Father, [C]I can come to [Gsus]You{,} and boast of [C]deeds I've [F]done In my [C]pride I strive to [Gsus]earn{,} the favor [C]Christ has [F]won He a[G]lone pleads my ac[F]ceptance, [C/E]all my [F]works [C/E]a[F]side So I [C]come with empty [G]hands{,} and I [F]cling to [C/E]Christ. [| F | C/G | G]
VERSE 2: Father, [C]I can go a[Gsus]stray{,} and battle [C/E]needless [F]fears Voices [C]tell me I’m con[Gsus]demned{,} and that I [C/E]can’t draw [F]near But Your [G]Spirit calls me [F]homeward{,} [C/E]with Your [F]words [C/E]of [F]life Jesus [C]bore my every [G]sin,{,} so I [F]cling to [C]Christ [| C]
BRIDGE: It’s more than [Dm7]I can [Am]do{,} to keep my [F]hold on [G]You But all my [Dm7]hope and [Am]peace{,} is that You [F]cling to [G]me It’s more than [Dm7]I can [Am]do{,} to keep my [F]hold on [G]You But all my [Dm7]hope and [Am]peace{,} is that You [F]cling to [G]me [| G]
VERSE 3: Father, [C]all my earthly [Gsus]aims{,} in time will [C/E]turn to [F]dust Let me [C]learn that loss is [Gsus]gain{,} for those who [C/E]know Your [F]love All the [G]treasures of this [F]world{,} will [C/E]never [F]sa[C/E]tis[F]fy You al[C]one are endless j[G]oy, so I c[F]ling to [Am7]Chri[(to go to bridge)]st [C]
TO END: You a[C]lone are endless [Gsus]joy, so I [F]cling to [C]Christ.
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 father i can come to you and boast of deeds ive done in my pride i strive to earn the favor christ has won he alone pleads my acceptance all my works aside so i come with empty hands and i cling to christ verse 2 father i can go astray and battle needless fears voices tell me im condemned and that i cant draw near but your spirit calls me homeward with your words of life jesus bore my every sin so i cling to christ bridge its more than i can do to keep my hold on you but all my hope and peace is that you cling to me its more than i can do to keep my hold on you but all my hope and peace is that you cling to me verse 3 father all my earthly aims in time will turn to dust let me learn that loss is gain for those who know your love all the treasures of this world will never satisfy you alone are endless joy so i cling to christ to end you alone are endless joy so i cling to christ
